name: up-Lifting
description: This is my submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021 under the theme "Stronger Together". My game "up-Lifting" takes the theme literally, by having you play as a bro at the gym, helping his other bros get a good workout in by boosting their stamina with protein bars and tons of space-bar mashing. This is the first project I've ever worked to completion, and although I wish I had a little more time to polish a few things, I had a blast making the game and I hope you have a blast playing it (or at least get a good laugh out of it).
